content.body:
I have updated the letter with the following on the advice from Istvan:

>We expect to the attendee count to be similar to normal plenary numbers, meaning approximately 40-60 TC39 delegates would participate in these sessions.  In order to get maximal benefit from this investment, TC39 would also be willing to advertise these sessions as being open to participants from other Ecma TCs.
content.formatted_body:
I have updated the letter with the following on the advice from Istvan:

We expect to the attendee count to be similar to normal plenary numbers, meaning approximately 40-60 TC39 delegates would participate in these sessions. In order to get maximal benefit from this investment, TC39 would also be willing to advertise these sessions as being open to participants from other Ecma TCs.

org.matrix.msc1767.message.body:
I have updated the letter with the following on the advice from Istvan:

>We expect to the attendee count to be similar to normal plenary numbers, meaning approximately 40-60 TC39 delegates would participate in these sessions.  In order to get maximal benefit from this investment, TC39 would also be willing to advertise these sessions as being open to participants from other Ecma TCs.

I have updated the letter with the following on the advice from Istvan:

We expect to the attendee count to be similar to normal plenary numbers, meaning approximately 40-60 TC39 delegates would participate in these sessions. In order to get maximal benefit from this investment, TC39 would also be willing to advertise these sessions as being open to participants from other Ecma TCs.

content.body: These workshops are _highly_ interactive, adding an unknown number of additional participants would mean that the trainers need to bring more staff, which would increase cost
content.formatted_body: These workshops are highly interactive, adding an unknown number of additional participants would mean that the trainers need to bring more staff, which would increase cost

org.matrix.msc1767.message.body: These workshops are _highly_ interactive, adding an unknown number of additional participants would mean that the trainers need to bring more staff, which would increase cost
These workshops are highly interactive, adding an unknown number of additional participants would mean that the trainers need to bring more staff, which would increase cost

content.body: In practice I do not think there would be many folk extra attend.  TC39 is the largest committee by far AFAICT.
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: In practice I do not think there would be many folk extra attend.  TC39 is the largest committee by far AFAICT.

content.body: So this is to soften Ecma's decision.
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: So this is to soften Ecma's decision.

content.body: Just to check, these workshops run over Zoom right?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Just to check, these workshops run over Zoom right?

content.body: They were scoped for online, yeah.
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: They were scoped for online, yeah.

content.body: good - that is safest
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: good - that is safest

content.body: Are you happy with the number 40-60?  I am just blanket assuming everyone who attends plenary would attend this.
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Are you happy with the number 40-60?  I am just blanket assuming everyone who attends plenary would attend this.

content.body: Let me check, one second.
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Let me check, one second.

content.body: Realistically I could imagine many delegates opting out.  Whilst some folk will be genuinely curious, we are relying on inertia to some extent.
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Realistically I could imagine many delegates opting out.  Whilst some folk will be genuinely curious, we are relying on inertia to some extent.

content.body: But for the purposes of justifying the cost to Ecma, I think we are more likely to succeed by assuming we shall have a full turnout.
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: But for the purposes of justifying the cost to Ecma, I think we are more likely to succeed by assuming we shall have a full turnout.

content.body: In my conversations with Kathy, I quoted up to 80 participants. So 40-60 + some number of other Ecma delegates should be fine.
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: In my conversations with Kathy, I quoted up to 80 participants. So 40-60 + some number of other Ecma delegates should be fine.

content.body: I think we are very safe then.
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: I think we are very safe then.

content.body: Agreed!
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Agreed!
